term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - primary pH standards
term.title: primary pH standards

item.text: Certain substances which meet the criteria of: reproducible preparation in a highly pure state; stability of solution over a reasonable period of time; having a low value of the residual liquid junction potential; having pH betwen 3 and 11.
